Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: alif॰ laam॰ ra॰. yah kitaab arthaat spasht quraan kee aayaten hain
aise samay aaenge jab inakaar karanevaale kaamana karenge ki kya hee achchha hota ki ham muslim (aagyaakaaree) hote
chhodo unhen khaen aur maze udaen aur (lambee) aasha unhen bhulaave mein daale rakhe. unhen jald hee maaloom ho jaega
hamane jis bastee ko bhee vinasht kiya hai, usake lie anivaaryatah ek nishchit faisala raha hai
kisee samudaay ke log na apane nishchi‍ta samay se aage badh sakate hai aur na ve peechhe rah sakate hai
ve kahate hai, "ai vyakti, jisapar anusmaran avatarit hua, tum nishchay hee deevaane ho
yadi tum sachche ho to hamaare samaksh farishton ko kyon nahin le aate
farishton ko ham keval saty ke prayojan hetu utaarate hai aur us samay logon ko muhalat nahin milegee
yah anusaran nishchay hee hamane avatarit kiya hai aur ham svayan isake rakshak hain
tumase pahale kitane hee vigat gironhon mein ham rasool bhej chuke hai
koee bhee rasool unake paas aisa nahin aaya, jisaka unhonne upahaas na kiya ho
isee tarah ham aparaadhiyon ke dilon mein ise utaarate hai
ve ise maanenge nahin. pahale ke logon kee misaalen guzar chukee hain
yadi ham unapar aakaash se koee dvaar khol den aur ve din-dahaade usamen chadhane bhee lagen
phir bhee ve yahee kahenge, "hamaaree aankhen madamaatee hain, balki ham logon par jaadoo kar diya gaya hai
